Â®io invitation for comments on this item provides a
formidable list of subjects for discussion; in fact* adequate
comments would require considerable engineering data which we
cannot afford to purchase# However, Lonnie has access to such
data from other sources, which he is willing to put to our use#
I recommend, therefore, that we support the continuance of
the TO educational reservations, with reference to the desirability
of continuing the television assignments as at present#
V/ould you please give me your reactions?
7* Translators# The matter of the operation of translators
is also current# I believe that no action by us is required at
this time# But, if any of our television licensees feel otherwise,
they should so indicate, in order that wo may take appropriate
action#
